00031 #define TOP_OF_STACK(x, y)              (UCHAR*) ( ((USHORT)x) + (y-1) )
00033 #define PUSH_TO_STACK(x, y)             *x = y; x--;

00083 #define Task_RestoreContext() \
00084 ASM("lds r26, pstCurrentTask"); \
00085 ASM("lds r27, pstCurrentTask + 1");\
00086 ASM("ld  r28, x+"); \
00087 ASM("out 0x3D, r28"); \

00129 #define CS_ENTER()      \
00130 { \
00131 volatile UCHAR x; \
00132 x = _SFR_IO8(SR_); \
00133 ASM("cli"); 
00134 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 #define CS_EXIT() \
00137 _SFR_IO8(SR_) = x;\
00138 }

00148 #define DISABLE_INTS()          ASM("cli");
